title: Design for Printed Textile-Quatrafoli, Series #625-630
provenance: This collection was donated to the Cooper-Hewitt, National Design Museum in 1969 by Alexander Girard
medium: Colored tissue, brush and watercolor, graphite on white tracing paper
description: Four petaled flower motif made from orange, pink and beige colored tissue paper, with watercolor centers arranged in four rows of six.
name: Drawing
